display_name: Polysomnography: Sleep efficiency - the proportion of sleep duration in in-bed period
description: Calculated. Sleep duration is the interval between sleep onset time and lights on/out-bed time while asleep, while in-bed period is the interval between lights off/in-bed time and lights on/out-bed time. Conventionally, this variable could be described as the ratio between total sleep time (TST) and time in bed (TIB) in polysomnography.
